mapper.insert: insert into AF_USER_EXAM_HISTORY (H_ID, TELNUM, EXAM_ID, EXAM_NAME, EXAM_TYPE, INDEXNUM, URL, TOTALSCORE, SURPLUSTIME, USEDTIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, ANSWER_RECORD) values (#{hId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surplustime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usedtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{answerRecord,jdbcType=CLOB})
mapper.update: update AF_USER_EXAM_HISTORY set TELNUM = #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_ID = #{examId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_NAME = #{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_TYPE = #{examType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDEXNUM = #{indexnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALSCORE = #{totalscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SURPLUSTIME = #{surplustime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEDTIME = #{usedtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ANSWER_RECORD = #{answerRecord,jdbcType=CLOB} where H_ID = #{hId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select H_ID, TELNUM, EXAM_ID, EXAM_NAME, EXAM_TYPE, INDEXNUM, URL, TOTALSCORE, SURPLUSTIME, USEDTIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, ANSWER_RECORD from AF_USER_EXAM_HISTORY where H_ID = #{hId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from AF_USER_EXAM_HISTORY where H_ID = #{hId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select EXAM_NAME as NAME,sum(usedtime) as times from AF_USER_EXAM_HISTORY where TELNUM = #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by EXAM_NAME
